flavorText:
"Before you release a Wolverine from the trap, make sure it's really dead."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

foreignData.name: Grauer Vielfraß
foreignData.text: {R}: +2/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges. Benutze diese Eigenschaft nur, wenn eine Kreatur zum Blocken des Vielfraßes deklariert wird und auch nur einmal pro Zug.

name: Grizzled Wolverine
originalText:
oo
R +2/+0 until end of turn. Use this ability only when a creature is assigned to block Grizzled Wolverine and only once each turn.

rulings.text: It can only get +2/+0 even if more than one creature blocks it.

text: {R}: Grizzled Wolverine gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate only during the declare blockers step, only if at least one creature is blocking Grizzled Wolverine, and only once each turn.
